content.sql: SELECT dbo.fn_getMarsWeekDay(convert(VARCHAR(20),ddp.bill_date,120)), ddr.dist_name, dp.PROD_CODE AS code, t1.item_name, dp.PROD_NAME AS name, ----- ddp.prod_quantity>=0进货，ddp.prod_quantity<0退货 sum(CASE WHEN ddp.prod_quantity>=0 THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,ddp.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 end) AS duenum1, sum(CASE WHEN ddp.prod_quantity>=0 THEN isnull(ddP.prod_amount,0) ELSE 0 end) AS dueprice1, sum(CASE WHEN ddp.prod_quantity>=0 THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,ddp.PROD_QUANTITY)*dp.prod_price,0) ELSE 0 end) AS duepricenum1, sum(CASE WHEN ddp.prod_quantity<0 THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,ddp.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 end) AS duenum2, sum(CASE WHEN ddp.prod_quantity<0 THEN isnull(ddP.prod_amount,0) ELSE 0 end) AS dueprice2, sum(CASE WHEN ddp.prod_quantity<0 THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,ddp.PROD_QUANTITY)*dp.prod_price,0) ELSE 0 end) AS duepricenum2, case when dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,1) is null then null else ddp.PROD_PRICE/dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,1) end, sum(CASE WHEN ddp.prod_quantity>=0 THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,ddp.PROD_QUANTITY)*dp.prod_price,0) ELSE 0 end) +sum(CASE WHEN ddp.prod_quantity<0 THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,ddp.PROD_QUANTITY)*dp.prod_price,0) ELSE 0 end) FROM Dms_Data_Purchase ddp INNER JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON dc.CLIENT_ID=ddp.CLIENT_ID INNER JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR ddr ON ddr.DIST_ID=dc.DIST_ID INNER JOIN DMS_PROD_MAPPING dpm ON dpm.DIST_PROD_CODE = ddp.PROD_CODE AND dpm.DIST_PROD_UNIT = ddp.PROD_UNIT and ddp.CLIENT_ID=dpm.CLIENT_ID left join BASE_DICT_ITEM item1 on dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID = item1.DICT_ITEM_ID INNER JOIN MDM_PRODUCT dp ON dp.PROD_CODE = dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE INNER JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM t1 ON t1.DICT_ITEM_ID=dp.TYPE_ID inner join base_org org on ddr.org_id=org.org_id WHERE ddp.state='1' and ddp.bill_date between (select cal_date from MDM_CALENDAR where cal_year='$year1$' and cal_month='$month1$' and cal_week='$week1$' and cal_day='1') and (select cal_date from MDM_CALENDAR where cal_year='$year1$' and cal_month='$month2$' and cal_week='$week2$' and cal_day='7') $orgSubCode$ $distId$ $distCode$ $prodCode$ $clientId$ GROUP BY dp.PROD_CODE,dp.PROD_NAME,ddr.dist_name, dbo.fn_getMarsWeekDay(convert(VARCHAR(20),ddp.bill_date,120)), t1.ITEM_NAME,case when dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,1) is null then null else ddp.PROD_PRICE/dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',dp.PROD_CODE,1) end
